price: Do not argue on behalf of those who betray themselves, for Allah does not like the treacherous and sinful.
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
